      @POST @Path("guest_login") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response guestLogin(@FormParam("enabled") Boolean enabled)
      Enable/disable guest login.
      参数:
      enabled - If true, enable guest login
      返回:
      Response

    • configSmtp

      @POST @Path("config_smtp") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response configSmtp(@FormParam("hostname") String hostname, @FormParam("port") String portStr, @FormParam("username") String username, @FormParam("password") String password, @FormParam("from") String from)
      Configure the SMTP server.
      参数:
      hostname - SMTP hostname
      portStr - SMTP port
      username - SMTP username
      password - SMTP password
      from - From address
      返回:
      Response

    • getConfigInbox

      @GET @Path("config_inbox") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response getConfigInbox()
      Get the inbox configuration.
      返回:
      Response

    • configInbox

      @POST @Path("config_inbox") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response configInbox(@FormParam("enabled") Boolean enabled, @FormParam("autoTagsEnabled") Boolean autoTagsEnabled, @FormParam("deleteImported") Boolean deleteImported, @FormParam("hostname") String hostname, @FormParam("port") String portStr, @FormParam("starttls") Boolean starttls, @FormParam("username") String username, @FormParam("password") String password, @FormParam("folder") String folder, @FormParam("tag") String tag)
      Configure the inbox.
      参数:
      enabled - True if the inbox scanning is enabled
      hostname - IMAP hostname
      portStr - IMAP port
      username - IMAP username
      password - IMAP password
      folder - IMAP folder
      tag - Tag for created documents
      返回:
      Response

    • testInbox

      @POST @Path("test_inbox") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response testInbox()
      Test the inbox.
      返回:
      Response

    • log

      @GET @Path("log") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response log(@QueryParam("level") String minLevel, @QueryParam("tag") String tag, @QueryParam("message") String message, @QueryParam("limit") Integer limit, @QueryParam("offset") Integer offset)
      Retrieve the application logs.
      参数:
      minLevel - Filter on logging level
      tag - Filter on logger name / tag
      message - Filter on message
      limit - Page limit
      offset - Page offset
      返回:
      Response

    • batchReindex

      @POST @Path("batch/reindex") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response batchReindex()
      Destroy and rebuild the search index.
      返回:
      Response

      Clean storage.
      返回:
      Response

      @GET @Path("config_ldap") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response getConfigLdap()
      Get the LDAP authentication configuration.
      返回:
      Response

    • configLdap

      @POST @Path("config_ldap") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response configLdap(@FormParam("enabled") Boolean enabled, @FormParam("host") String host, @FormParam("port") String portStr, @FormParam("usessl") Boolean usessl, @FormParam("admin_dn") String adminDn, @FormParam("admin_password") String adminPassword, @FormParam("base_dn") String baseDn, @FormParam("filter") String filter, @FormParam("default_email") String defaultEmail, @FormParam("default_storage") String defaultStorageStr)
      Configure the LDAP authentication.
      参数:
      enabled - LDAP authentication enabled
      host - LDAP server host
      portStr - LDAP server port
      usessl - LDAP use SSL (ldaps)
      adminDn - Admin DN
      adminPassword - Admin password
      baseDn - Base DN
      filter - LDAP filter
      defaultEmail - LDAP default email
      defaultStorageStr - LDAP default storage
      返回:
      Response
